data.text: I'm going to bring back the star.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>I'm going to bring back the star.

data.text: Huh? What… do you mean?
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed: <story>Huh? What… do you mean?

data.text:
I'm used to the snow. So tell me where the star 
is and I'll go down the mountain and get it.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>I'm used to the snow. So tell me where the star 
<story>is and I'll go down the mountain and get it.

data.text:
No, you don't have to do that…! 
The star really isn't necessary for this party…!
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>No, you don't have to do that…! 
<story>The star really isn't necessary for this party…!

data.text:
That star carries the hopes and dreams of these 
children, so of course it needs to be here.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>That star carries the hopes and dreams of these 
<story>children, so of course it needs to be here.

data.text:
I'm sorry to say, but it is way too dangerous for you to go out 
right now! Plus, and I apologize for saying this, but you're 
what some may call… directionally challenged…
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>I'm sorry to say, but it is way too dangerous for you to go out 
<story>right now! Plus, and I apologize for saying this, but you're 
<story>what some may call… directionally challenged…

data.text:
I have a better sense of direction in the mountains than in the 
city, so it won't be a problem. I'm heading out.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>I have a better sense of direction in the mountains than in the 
<story>city, so it won't be a problem. I'm heading out.

data.text:
Wait! I said wait, please!! 
You don't even know where it's at!
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>Wait! I said wait, please!! 
<story>You don't even know where it's at!

data.text:
Did something happen? 
We could hear you from the other room…
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Did something happen? 
<story>We could hear you from the other room…

data.text:
Biwa Hayahide-san!? Why are you… Wait, that's 
not important right now! You showed up at the 
perfect time! Please stop Oguri-san!
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>Biwa Hayahide-san!? Why are you… Wait, that's 
<story>not important right now! You showed up at the 
<story>perfect time! Please stop Oguri-san!

data.text: I see… I understand the situation now.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>I see… I understand the situation now.

data.text:
Hey, you know us Uma Musume can easily run through snowy 
mountains. This much snow isn't that dangerous.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Hey, you know us Uma Musume can easily run through snowy 
<story>mountains. This much snow isn't that dangerous.

data.text:
But I'm really bad with words, so I can't convince them… Could 
you please explain it to them for me?
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>But I'm really bad with words, so I can't convince them… Could 
<story>you please explain it to them for me?

data.text:
Oguri-san, I apologize but 
I have to agree with your fans here.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Oguri-san, I apologize but 
<story>I have to agree with your fans here.

data.text: Huh…!?
data.name: Oguri & Taishin
data.processed: <story>Huh…!?

data.text:
It is true that there is little risk in going through this 
blizzard for us. However, any amount of risk is still a risk… 
The threat of danger still looms, no matter how small.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>It is true that there is little risk in going through this 
<story>blizzard for us. However, any amount of risk is still a risk… 
<story>The threat of danger still looms, no matter how small.

data.text:
Please think about it this way. If something were to happen to 
you, what would your fans think? What might they do?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Please think about it this way. If something were to happen to 
<story>you, what would your fans think? What might they do?

data.text: I…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>I…

data.text:
Oguri-san… Do you remember when you asked me 
what kind of present your fans would like?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Oguri-san… Do you remember when you asked me 
<story>what kind of present your fans would like?

data.text:
Oguri-san, what we need is the one thing that you could give that 
would make all of your fans happy. I know for a fact that the 
answer to that is somewhere inside of you.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Oguri-san, what we need is the one thing that you could give that 
<story>would make all of your fans happy. I know for a fact that the 
<story>answer to that is somewhere inside of you.

data.text:
Now that it's come to this… I can tell you the answer. What I 
had hoped you'd understand is that you yourself are the answer
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Now that it's come to this… I can tell you the answer. What I 
<story>had hoped you'd understand is that you yourself are the answer

data.text: Myself…?
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>Myself…?

data.text:
Correct. If you were to become Santa you would essentially be 
taking the place of those throwing this party for you.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Correct. If you were to become Santa you would essentially be 
<story>taking the place of those throwing this party for you.

data.text:
Oguri-san, the purpose of this party was to support you… 
That's all it ever was. All they ask of 
you is to simply return their feelings.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Oguri-san, the purpose of this party was to support you… 
<story>That's all it ever was. All they ask of 
<story>you is to simply return their feelings.

data.text:
That fact alone means that you are the best present for them, 
wouldn't you say? And because of that… having you do something 
so reckless would be unnecessary.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>That fact alone means that you are the best present for them, 
<story>wouldn't you say? And because of that… having you do something 
<story>so reckless would be unnecessary.

data.text:
Hayahide-san is right. The fact that you've been trying to help 
us… we truly, truly appreciate it.
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>Hayahide-san is right. The fact that you've been trying to help 
<story>us… we truly, truly appreciate it.

data.text:
But… the thought is all we need. 
See, even the children appreciate it. So please…
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>But… the thought is all we need. 
<story>See, even the children appreciate it. So please…

data.text:
I know… it isn't good to make others worry. 
So I guess I won't…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>I know… it isn't good to make others worry. 
<story>So I guess I won't…

data.text:
Hey, Oguri-san. 
How do you feel about this?
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>Hey, Oguri-san. 
<story>How do you feel about this?

data.text: Taishin?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>Taishin?

data.text:
Have you considered how she feels? Have you considered that she 
wants to show her appreciation by making them happy?
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>Have you considered how she feels? Have you considered that she 
<story>wants to show her appreciation by making them happy?

data.name: Oguri & Hayahide
data.processed: <story>…!

data.text:
I doubt she'd be satisfied making them happy by just being here. 
What if she wants to make them happy in a more… tangible way.
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>I doubt she'd be satisfied making them happy by just being here. 
<story>What if she wants to make them happy in a more… tangible way.

data.text:
That's why… Oguri-san, you should do whatever you want to do. 
Simply being here… That's not good enough, is it?
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>That's why… Oguri-san, you should do whatever you want to do. 
<story>Simply being here… That's not good enough, is it?

data.text:
After all… A present isn't something 
you receive and call it a day.
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>After all… A present isn't something 
<story>you receive and call it a day.

data.text:
To put it bluntly, simply having the two of you with 
me brings me all the joy in the world. That's why I've 
been a bit overzealous with my preparation.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>To put it bluntly, simply having the two of you with 
<story>me brings me all the joy in the world. That's why I've 
<story>been a bit overzealous with my preparation.

data.text: Taishin…
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>Taishin…

data.text:
Thank you… Taishin. I get it now. 
I will answer their feelings… in my own way.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Thank you… Taishin. I get it now. 
<story>I will answer their feelings… in my own way.

data.text:
Whenever there are children who are disappointed, I want to make 
them smile. I won't shy away from a challenge… I will use my 
power to cheer them up.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Whenever there are children who are disappointed, I want to make 
<story>them smile. I won't shy away from a challenge… I will use my 
<story>power to cheer them up.

data.text:
Oguri-san… I understand how you feel, I really do. However, from 
a purely practical perspective it would be very difficult to 
bring the star back here.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Oguri-san… I understand how you feel, I really do. However, from 
<story>a purely practical perspective it would be very difficult to 
<story>bring the star back here.

data.text:
Moreover, I heard the star is very large. Even 
if you could get through the blizzard, it would 
be difficult to bring it back here.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Moreover, I heard the star is very large. Even 
<story>if you could get through the blizzard, it would 
<story>be difficult to bring it back here.

data.text:
It might be fine if Taishin and I were to help, but… we aren't 
familiar with snowy mountains. We would simply be a hindrance to 
you, Oguri-san. We should consider an alternative.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>It might be fine if Taishin and I were to help, but… we aren't 
<story>familiar with snowy mountains. We would simply be a hindrance to 
<story>you, Oguri-san. We should consider an alternative.

data.text: Hmm… That's…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>Hmm… That's…

data.text: Don't you worry about that ♪
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed: <story>Don't you worry about that ♪

data.text: You two…! Did you come to join the party?
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>You two…! Did you come to join the party?

data.text:
Nope! We told you we were searching for a Christmas 
miracle, didn't we? Well Marve-chin's radar is 
getting a response right here!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Nope! We told you we were searching for a Christmas 
<story>miracle, didn't we? Well Marve-chin's radar is 
<story>getting a response right here!

data.text:
Yup! My marvelous hunch brought us together once again ☆ 
But that's not all it did ♪
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Yup! My marvelous hunch brought us together once again ☆ 
<story>But that's not all it did ♪

data.text:
That marvelous thing we found is 
sure to come in handy right now ☆ 
With it you can carry anything with ease ★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>That marvelous thing we found is 
<story>sure to come in handy right now ☆ 
<story>With it you can carry anything with ease ★

data.text:
In other words… 
Oguri-san, it's time to take off ♪ ☆
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>In other words… 
<story>Oguri-san, it's time to take off ♪ ☆
